snippet: The first existing studio to reach the milestone, it is planning to release on Blu-ray commemorative versions of classics like "To Kill a Mockingbird" and "E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial."
abstract: The first existing studio to reach the milestone, it is planning to release on Blu-ray commemorative versions of classics like "To Kill a Mockingbird" and "E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial."

headline.main: Universal Studios Turns 100 and Plans a Year of Celebrations
